HOW TO USE

Drink one shot daily — either straight from the bottle or over ice with sparkling water. Enjoy with or without food. Shake well before drinking.

STORAGE
Store at room temperature, away from direct sunlight to preserve potency. Consume within 18 months.

A QUICK NOTE We recommend consulting your healthcare provider before adding any supplements to your routine, particularly if you have any health conditions or are taking medications.

settings.title: Molecular Hydrogen Enters the Body
settings.text: HydroBurn infuses water with Molecular Hydrogen (H₂), a clinically studied compound with over 1,500 research publications on oxidative stress, metabolism, and longevity. Once consumed, H₂ molecules rapidly absorb into the bloodstream and reach cells.

settings.title: Selective Reduction of Oxidative Stress
settings.text: Unlike traditional antioxidants, Molecular Hydrogen is selective—meaning it only targets and neutralizes harmful free radicals, while preserving beneficial oxidative functions needed for metabolism. This reduces oxidative stress, a primary factor in metabolic slowdown, inflammation, and fatigue.

settings.title: Mitochondrial Energy Optimization
settings.text: Molecular Hydrogen penetrates deep into mitochondria, improving their efficiency in energy (ATP) production. This results in sustained energy levels, better endurance, and enhanced recovery—without stimulants. Improved mitochondrial function supports long-term metabolic efficiency and longevity.

settings.title: Metabolic Balance & Long-Term Benefits
settings.text: By regulating oxidative stress and enhancing mitochondrial efficiency, HydroBurn supports metabolic balance. Studies show potential improvements in insulin sensitivity, faster recovery times, and sustained metabolic function over time. No caffeine, no crashes—just clean, intelligent metabolic support.
